question number six is option B bridge
because bridge connects to LAN segments
of same protocol question number seven

router because bridge can connect to

it just regenerates and switch is used
to establish a local area network that
is a single local area network question

layer 2 devices option J huh option B
Bridge option C repeater option D switch
so the answer is option B and D because
hub is a layer one device and repeater
